snippet: "Seven on Seven," an event founded in 2010 by Rhizome, the new-media art organization in New York, will have its third incarnation later this month, when seven artists and seven people drawn from the world of technological innovation will pair off...
abstract: "Seven on Seven," an event founded in 2010 by Rhizome, the new-media art organization in New York, will have its third incarnation later this month, when seven artists and seven people drawn from the world of technological innovation will pair off and sequester themselves in rooms and studios around the city, trying to come up with the next great digital idea.

headline.main: Artists and Technologists Team Up for Rhizome Event
